snippet.title: Crucible | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Crucible is live now! Download the game on Steam and play for free today! http://bit.ly/wishlistcrucible

Crucible is a team-based PvP action shooter drive by the choices you make. In each match, you'll work alongside fellow hunters to take on the opposition, complete objectives, and prove that you've got what it takes to emerge victorious.
